languages.text: As long as the Arbitrator has more than 90% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they are immune to the following {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

traits.locale_text: As long as the Arbitrator has more than 90% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they are immune to the following {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

As long as the Arbitrator has more than 75% wounds, they are immune to the following negative effects: fatigued, disturbed, perplexed, blinded, staggered, slowed, stunned, immobilised, cannot attack, and prone.

As long as the Arbitrator has more than 90% {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}wounds{/g}, they are immune to the following {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative effects{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}blinded{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}disturbed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigued{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}slowed{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}staggered{/g}.

languages.text: Yargıcı, {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}sağlık{/g} puanı %90'dan fazla olduğu sürece şu {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}olumsuz etkilere{/g} karşı bağışıklığa sahip olur: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Körleşme{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}kaygı{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}yorgunluk{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}yavaşlama{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}afallama{/g}.

languages.text: Mientras el Arbitrator tenga más del 90% de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, es inmune a los siguientes {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Mientras el Arbitrator tenga más del 75 % de sus {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}heridas{/g}, es inmune a los siguientes {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}efectos negativos{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}cegado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}no puede atacar{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}perturbado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}fatigado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}derribado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}ralentizado{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}desequilibrado{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdido{/g}.

languages.text: 只要法务官的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}高于90%，就对以下{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}免疫：{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}。

traits.locale_text: 只要法务官的{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}生命值{/g}高于75%，就对以下{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}负面效果{/g}免疫：{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}致盲{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}无法攻击{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}惊扰{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲劳{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}倒地{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}减速{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}恐慌{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}。

languages.text: Tant que l'arbitrator a plus de 90 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} suivants ne peuvent pas l'affecter : {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Tant que l'arbitrator a plus de 75 % de {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}blessures{/g}, les {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}effets négatifs{/g} suivants ne peuvent pas l'affecter : {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Aveuglement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}Attaque impossible{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Perturbation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Fatigue{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}Immobilisation{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}Paralysie{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Ralentissement{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Sidération{/g} et {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}Étourdissement{/g}.

languages.text: アービトレイターに90%以上の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がある限り、以下の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}に対して耐性を有する。{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}。

traits.locale_text: アービトレイターに75%以上の{g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}傷{/g}がある限り、以下の{g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}マイナス効果{/g}に対して耐性を有する。{g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}盲目{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:CantAttackEffect}攻撃不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}動揺{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}疲労{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:ProneEffect}脆弱化{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}スロウ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}よろけ{/g}、{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶{/g}。

languages.text: Solange der Arbitrator mehr als 90 % {g|Encyclopedia:HitPoints}Wunden{/g} hat, ist er immun gegen folgende {g|Encyclopedia:NegativeEffectTypesGlossary}negative Effekte{/g}: {g|Encyclopedia:BlindedEffect}Geblendet{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:DisturbedEffect}Verstört{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:FatiguedEffect}Erschöpft{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:SlowedEffect}Verlangsamt{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:StaggeredEffect}Taumelnd{/g}.
